title: What are Flatpaks? | How to install & permissions

media:group.media:title: What are Flatpaks? | How to install & permissions
media:group.media:description:
Flatpaks have many great advantages. They can be sandboxed to protect your system. They usually carry newer versions of software than repos. And they are distro independent, which means they run as they should on any distro that supports Flatpaks.

In this video I'll go over how they work, how to install them, and how to change what permissions they have.

Flathub : https://www.flathub.org

Consider supporting my channel : https://www.patreon.com/doriandotslash/
